doc.title: Annemi hatirliyorum
doc.plot: This is the excellent adaptation of John van Druten's famous play "I remember Mama" by the Turkish Radio & Television Broadcastings (aka TRT) produced and aired at Turkish TV in 1977. As in the original play it tells the story of Hansen family , an American family of immigrants from Norway . This TV mini series turned the young Derya Baykal who played the role of Katrin to a major Turkish TV star, still very active today in different Turkish TV channels.
